Contact

Contact us

If you want to contribute, add yourself to the contributors list and join our Slack channel: Sign up for slack Open Science MOOC

If you have questions about the project, please email us directly or contact Jon Tennant.

If you have inputs for our webpage, please contact Monika Schlatter.

Stay tuned on what’s happening on Twitter with @OpenScienceMOOC.

We appreciate any input, and please help spread the word!
